space.world

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • space.world.Entity
      • space.world.NonStationary
        • space.world.Character
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ViewableNonStationary, ViewableObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Player

    public abstract class Character
extends NonStationary
    Represents a Character. Could be a player or some non-player character
